@garythegooner56 Yep, but he was guilty !
@NadineDorriesMP @Nilstar1 Diane Abbott & Jeremy Corbyn & Co. Can you imagine that lot running our country ? Doesn't bare thinking about.
@doyley100 Agreed. Was a different class to Ozil. Great mentality and desire.
@doyley100 Maybe James. I think Wenger was tempted until he heard the size of the contract that Chelsea were offering Cesc,
@DanielArsenal1 He was past his best Daniel. Had lost some of the pace that he didn't really have ! Also stamina issues.Wouldn't have worked
Watford were 16-1 to bear Arsenal on Tuesday. I wonder what the impact of our new "Sports Psychotherapist has been so far ?
Arsene Wenger may leave Arsenal THIS summer because of abuse from supporters https://t.co/4sSDjk60r7 NEXT TIME FANS SING " ONE AW" HE SIGNS
What was Cesc supposed to do ? Maybe retire so as not to upset the Arsenal fans !
Arsenal had easily the best years out of Cesc. When he left Barca he was struggling. We had Ozil. He had a choice of M.U or Chelsea.
Never mind about "strike" Wenger was in touch with Cesc the whole time he was at Barca with a view to bringing him "home!" Nearly happened.
@mzk90 It was the same then as now with Wenger. Kept coming up short. Barca had chased him for 3 seasons. How long should he have waited ?

Cesc loved Arsenal. Fans have to be realistic. The great North Bank legend Charlie George was ready to join Spurs. https://t.co/mDrppux7bF
@mzk90 Wenger should have understood that he wanted Barca and guaranteed success, and not stood in his way.
@daniellandau27 He wasn't perfect, but Wenger should have accepted that he wanted to play for the best team in the world, hometown club.
For those who don't like my Cesc comments : Barca born & bred. Best team in world. Sweated blood for AFC. Why stay with perennial loser AW.

@LeeGardner76 He's been there for five minutes and totally transformed them, despite a poor start. That's what a quality manager can do.

@grega93 He would IMO. He could play in any team in the Prem. You adjust. So who is working in CM with our current system ?
